definitions.definition: The status , methods , character or standards expected of a professional or of a professional organization , such as reliability , discretion , evenhandedness , and fair play .
The use of professionals rather than amateurs in any sport etc.

main_definition: The status , methods , character or standards expected of a professional or of a professional organization , such as reliability , discretion , evenhandedness , and fair play .
secondary_definitions: The use of professionals rather than amateurs in any sport etc.
